txt.en: You have tested various swimming spots around Furtherholm. You should return to Merkh창ma outside of The Cracked Flagon and share your opinions with her.
TBD\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
Swim in the southern cove
Swim at the west side of the harbour
The water is warm and perfect for swimming
Swim in the northern channel
TBD something about the spot

'I must linger here and be available to guests who ask for help. Many ask for advice on where the best swimming places are, and I admit I do not know! I stand here all the time!

'Were you to take some time to explore the island and test out places to swim, I will reward you when you return and tell me what you learned.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
Merkh창ma has asked you to test various swimming spots around Furtherholm and then share your opinions with her.
TBD something about the spot
Swim off the western beach
Talk to Merkh창ma
The water is cold and the waves are a bit much
Swim off the south-western beach
This is a nice, quiet place to swim
'DNT This text is for hobbits only'

'So [placeholder], how was the swimming?'

You tell her that the water is warmer where it is shallow and it's easier to swim where there are less waves - and advise her on where these places are.

'Thank you, you have been of much help. As a mariner, I usually prioritize staying on the boat and not ending up in the water. I do not understand people who go in the water on purpose, but when they ask, I will repeat what you have told me. You have my thanks!'
Not a bad place to swim, but it is quite public
DNT This text is for everyone else
Searching for Swimming Spots
The water in the channel is calm and warm
Visitors often ask Merkh창ma where the best places to swim are, but she doesn't know.
